user_query: I recently placed an order on your website, and I would like to get the details of my order. Can you provide me with the order information by using the 'Get Order' API? Additionally, I would like to see the products in my order. Please fetch the products using the 'Get Products' API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the order details using the 'Get Order' API.
Retrieve the products listed in the order using the 'Get Products' API.
